SEARCH
Module ingsw.codex_naturalis
Package ingsw.codex_naturalis.server

Class ServerImpl

java.lang.Object
ingsw.codex_naturalis.server.ServerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Server, Remote
public class ServerImpl extends Object implements Server
Main server, used to manage the lobby and the starting games, it also takes trace of all the clients and started games.

    • register

      public void register(Client client)
      First method called by a client connected to the server, it adds the client to the loggedOutClients list
      Specified by:
      register in interface Server
      Parameters:
      client - client that has connected

    • chooseNickname

      public void chooseNickname(Client client, String nickname)
      Called by a client to set his nickname, it checks that the name is unique. It also checks if there is a disconnected player with that nickname associated to a game, in this case, it reconnects the client to the game.
      Specified by:
      chooseNickname in interface Server
      Parameters:
      client - client caller
      nickname - nickname chosen

    • accessExistingGame

      public void accessExistingGame(Client client, int gameID)
      Method called from the client when he wants to join an existing game that hasn't started yet.
      Specified by:
      accessExistingGame in interface Server
      Parameters:
      client - caller
      gameID - game id of the game to join

    • getGameController

      public GameController getGameController(Client client) throws RemoteException
      Method called by an RMI client to get his game controller, it makes sure to export the stub only once.

    • imAlive

      public void imAlive(Client client)
      Part of the resilience, method called every 5 seconds from the client. In every call, it sets a new timeout of 10 seconds on that client.
      Specified by:
      imAlive in interface Server
      Parameters:
      client - client caller

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect(Client client)
      Method called when a client's timeout expires, it removes the client from the game.
      Parameters:
      client - disconnected client

    • endGame

      public void endGame(GameControllerImpl gameController)
      Method called when a game has to be canceled because of players leaving, or called from the game controller when the game ends.
      Parameters:
      gameController - game to end

      public GameControllerImpl getGameControllerImpl(Client client)
      Method called by the client skeleton (socket) to get the game controller.
